name: debguy scripts
short_description:
A list of scripts and synopis are visible on Files page. (README.debguyscripts)

"build" - both downloads (wget) and builds 350+ GNU/Linux pkgs (some bsd too) from scratch (from kernel to firefox) - has all fixes needed to go pretty much non-stop no build errors, very little typing or hacking, unlike L.F.S.  caveats: yr 2010 files, require ability to read bash to make a chroot

get-make-install-X11R7.6 - (like the above but only gets/builds X alone from tarballs, not git)

emkfontdirs ; extended mkfontdir , does allot for you emkfontdir doesn't (warning: not for novices).  fix_fonts runs emkfontdirs with options (-D -L are usefile w/xorg)

man-tty-bland ; cat manpage ascii (no hidden special chars like -P cat)

MAKEDEV update having dri, fb, alsa (new alsa  gets kern info from /sys, need that these days)

and several more ... see files page
summary: debguy variety of useful scripts w/no sf page
